short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prompts confirmation before opening a link and logs activity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌐 HackerAI - Link Confirmation 🔒

🚨 Stay Safe Online!
HackerAI protects you by showing a security alert whenever you’re about to visit an insecure HTTP website (instead of secure HTTPS).

🔎 How It Works:
1️⃣ Click on a link.
2️⃣ If it’s not secure, HackerAI shows a warning pop-up 🛑:

"Are you sure?"
Options: Proceed ✅ or Cancel ❌.
🛡️ Perfect for:

Avoiding risky websites 🚫
Keeping your online experience secure and private 🔐
✨ Powered by HackerAI
